Area under curve (AUC)

Area under curve (AUC) of a graph shows x multiplied by y for a given range. The area under a concentration-time curve can give you cardiac output, clearance, and volume of distribution.

AUC = C*T = M/V*t = Mt/V

AUC/MASS = t/V

MASS/AUC = V/t = flow.

VD = Î¤*dose/AUC

(see pharmacokinetics)=
